name: Escape Room 7
description:
Detective Jake Stone receives a call from the police station indicating that he must go to the Hoffman home where the shooting was reported.

Our detective in his first week of work is heading to his worst adventure.

Escape Room The Seven Keys is a graphic mystery adventure where your logical reasoning will help you escape, in addition to solving different challenges.

Each room is a different world.

What are these keys?
Where did these keys appear from?
Discover the mystery after finding all the keys

Features:

* Optimized and Re-designed Graphics
* Correction in the illuminations
* Structured Mysteries
* Enigmas of difficulty easy to difficult
* Inventory to review acquired items
* Optimized Touch
* Up to 3 Profiles to share with your friends
* Save function in the place you want
* History in English
* English subtitles
* Enigmas in English
* Additional languages English, Russian

The Seven Keys Escape Room Part 1
